title: HABIB COBRA 4.53 V1.04 A Newer Version For PS3
description:
HABIB 4.53: Cobra Edition v1.04

prx loading at startup, iso mounting, ntfs support are working but however i cant fix ps2 for bc consoles as i dont have bc consoles and didnt patch for ps3 slim as ps2 classic and cobra uses same ps2_netemu for ps3 slim

NOTE:
1.ps2 isos for slim is ps2 classic as cobra and ps2 classic uses same ps2_netemu and i cant fix issue of bc consoles as i dont have any bc console
2.if you have installed bad plugin etc,pls change fw from cobra(from recovery of course) to different as cobra safe_mode isnt working properly on 4.53

WARNING:
DONT TRY TO SPOOF FW VERSION!!

all the other patches of a cfw is included


DONATION:
this was a work done by taking so much time.so if you like you can donate me: LINK

THANKS:
1.kokotonix for trying to help
2.user for helping me in clarifying some things up (rtoc)
3.deank for his mm
4.naehwert
5.failoverflow
6.all other devs

SRC:
it is included in download pkg.i have done partial work of ps2 too but it wont work 
i hope you will make a good use of it 

TO OTHER DEVS:
stage0 base needs updating and stage1 flash_mount_446.S.flash mount uses ppc 64 bit instructions found in lv2_kernel and in lv2_dump,if you do not do this or the system cant allocate stage2 then it will kick you in recovery mode 

TO PREVENT COPY-CATERS:
signatures on offset 10108 of lv0.elf 


THIS COBRA PORT IS DONE FIRST TIME BY ME,SO I MAY PROVIDE UPDATES OVER TIME....


CHANGELOG v1.04:
1.FIXED CONTROLLER ISSUE ON SOME GAMES(THANKS TO REPORTERS OF THIS ISSUE)
2.STABILITY IMPROVEMENT(A LITTLE)
3.ADDED CATEGORY_GAME.XML FOR WEBMAN BY DEFAULT
